name: get-selection-range-from-elm
description: window.getSelection().rangeAt(0) but only if it exists & is within an element

scripts.test: browserify -t babelify -d test.js | devtool -c -q --bf -h | faucet && semistandard | snazzy
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel lib --out-dir dist
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && babel -w lib --out-dir dist

author: mic.com
